title: RssFeedRead
description: Modern RSS feed reader with real-time updates and intelligent content filtering. Built for the Windows ecosystem with responsive design.

title: A-Frame Earth Moon
description: Interactive WebVR experience showing Earth and Moon in space. Built with A-Frame for immersive browser-based virtual reality.

title: Nuxt Firebase Integration
description: Full-stack Vue.js application with Firebase backend integration. Demonstrates server-side rendering with real-time database features.

title: React RxJS Hooks
description: Collection of useful React hooks powered by RxJS for reactive programming. Simplifies state management with observable streams.

title: FFmpeg Canvas Recorder
description: TypeScript-based canvas recording solution using FFmpeg. Captures HTML5 canvas animations and converts to video formats.

title: Lambda Video Pipeline
description: Serverless video processing pipeline using AWS Lambda. Automated video recording and transcoding with cloud infrastructure.
